programmes.show_description: This is BBC Radio 5 Sports Extra - bringing you even more live commentaries from the world's greatest sporting events. Listen on BBC Sounds.
This is BBC Radio 5 Sports Extra - bringing you even more live commentaries from the world's greatest sporting events. Listen on BBC Sounds.
Live ball-by-ball cricket commentary of Sri Lanka v Pakistan in the ICC Men's T20 World Cup at the Pallekele International Cricket Stadium in Kandy.
Live football commentary of Newcastle United v Everton in the Premier League.

Live rugby league commentary from BBC Radio Merseyside of Warrington Wolves v Wakefield Trinity in the Super League.

Live ball-by-ball cricket commentary from ABC in Australia of Australia Women v India Women in the 3rd ODI at the Bellerive Oval in Hobart.
Live ball-by-ball cricket commentary of Zimbabwe v South Africa in the ICC Men's T20 World Cup at the Arun Jaitley Stadium in Delhi.
Live ball-by-ball cricket commentary of India v West Indies in the ICC Men's T20 World Cup at Eden Gardens in Kolkata. Full match commentary is available on Sports Extra 3.
Live football commentary of Fulham v Tottenham Hotspur in the Premier League.
